svg.text: Indigenous-Led Planetary Guidance Across Traditional Territories and Watersheds
River System Coordination • Water Quality Protection
• Ethical protocols for peace practice exchange
• Water, land, and sacred site disputes
Modified Haudenosaunee protocols with 70% agreement threshold
Ceremonial openings, seasonal cycles, traditional governance
Rotating bioregional locations following cultural calendars
48-hour activation for extractive invasions and cultural emergencies
All Earth Council guidance integrates with Treaty mechanisms and Meta-Governance coordination to ensure Indigenous sovereignty in planetary peace decisions
